reviewDescription: These beads have a lower heat point so they will melt much faster. I highly recommend not mixing these with other brands. I made another project just using these beads and it looked fine. However, it is less sturdy than other brands. It feels much more soft and fragile.

reviewDescription: The beads are as described and come in a nice variety of colors for the price, but 1 of the bead boards melted under my iron the first time I tried to use them. I've used the same heat with other fuse beads/bead boards and I've never had this problem before, I guess the boards which come with these are flimsy. They work fine with a lower heat but now I'm down a bead board.

reviewDescription: Not sure of all the over melting low ratings … bought this with a small craft iron and my daughter has no issues with over melting. These have worked out great and keeps her engaged and creative. Good value since these are a bit less dollar bucks than others with quite a lot of colors for the beads.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2025

reviewDescription: I have been using fuse beads for a while, and I’ve never experienced anything like this. They melt way too easily and get stuck to the peg board. Seriously never seen this. I iron the same amount of time I normally would, I actually did less time on the one I just made and it over melted. Every bead over-melts almost instantly and I can’t find the damn sweet spot of time to even use the damn beads. I’ve had to throw away 3 pairs because they were garbage. Every single time they over melted. I make earrings, I don’t have a lot of money, and it makes me sad that these are so garbage. Literally adhered to the peg board I cannot remove it. I’m pissed off. I promise I know how to use fuse beads. I’ve made over 100 pairs successfully with other brands. I got these for the amount of colors and the array of colors, but I’ve clearly made a mistake and will stick with the brands I’ve used before. Great color selection but just, no.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2024

reviewDescription: Like it, fun to do different characters, love the different shades, variety of colors… need to buy more brown… I have an order of teddy bears keychains for a babyshower

reviewDescription: My daughter is enjoying her beads

reviewDescription: Good kit
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2025

reviewTitle: Terrible quality beads, actual garbage product
reviewDescription: This kit is garbage and I regret buying it at all. First of all, these are much smaller than typical perler / fuse beads. Which is fine, however, upon ironing my finished beads according to the directions (recommended 1-2 minutes) it completely melted the beads into LIQUID and the board is deformed as well. It’s cheap garbage. Neither the beads nor the pegboard can withstand the heat to properly fuse them together. Not to mention the “ironing paper” they give you is A PIECE OF PLASTIC THAT MELTS ONCE IT MAKES CONTACT WITH THE IRON. It’s literally just PLASTIC. Thank god I didn’t use it and ruin my iron, but seriously, what the hell is wrong with the people who made this? I have a lot of experience with fuse beads, but this is a scam. Don’t waste your money on this brand/seller, go buy from a reliable source. The fact that after ONE small use and ironing for less than an entire minute ruined my project AND the pegboard is unacceptable and ridiculous. I cannot recommend this at all.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2025

reviewTitle: Really small but I love them
reviewDescription: They are really small and they take a long time to make something cool but it’s fun. Some colors do run out fast though.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2025

reviewDescription: First of all: anyone who gives a low star review because they didn’t use their eyes to read the title that clearly states the size should really change their review. That’s user error, not the fault of the vendor. Second: my kit came with two of the same browns by the greys. Not the same as in the photo. Kinda bummed, but it’s fine. Docked a star in this review because it’s a vendor, not user, error. Otherwise, the size is perfect & is just what I needed.

reviewTitle: All was accounted for. Good quality. Good price.
reviewDescription: I purchased these and shared with my 2 grandsons. They have never done these before and I did these with my 2 daughters when they were little..they loved them and it is not only for girls but for boys as well...even adults. I enjoyed the quality time with my grandsons and was happy they enjoyed this craft. Plan on doing more of them later. They are little pricey for my budget, but hope I can get more later. Would love to get larger ones because 1 of my grandsons is very young, but did an excellent job and really loved it and. the glow in the dark, they both would love. Hopefully they will go on sale and I can get them both.
